item.title: By: debtortograce
item.dc:creator: debtortograce
item.description:
Bash Dr. Trueman, if you like, but fail to listen to him at your own risk. This brother has a knack for holding up the mirror of God's word to American culture at an angle that reveals our foibles keenly and accurately, making no pretense to flattery. Sometimes the perspective of an 'outsider' looking in (Prov. 27:6?)is precisely what we need to see ourselves more clearly...
I paraphrase: "Who, but the Americans, could put cheese in an aerosol can and call it an improvement?"
